name: Salvor: Wolf Cushion
description:
Super-sized soft organic cotton cushion, handmade and printed with soy ink in Brooklyn, USA. A unique collection of cushions with sepia toned vintage images more about artistry than seasonal fashion. Cute in a cool way, not the saccharine way, to bring the outside in!

The Designer

Ross Menuez, the designer behind the brand, has a varied background which includes industrial and product design.

Menuez also founded Salvor Projects in 2003, for which he was a finalist in the 2009 Cooper-Hewitt National Design Awards in Product Design. Early projects include commissioned pieces for Bruce Weber, Mariko Mori and a costume for Bjork. The line is currently sold at Barneys New York, Dover Street Market, Isetan, Maria Luisa and Space Mue.

Additional Information
100% organic cotton, printed with soy ink Country of Origin: USA Size: 20 x 22"

name: Behance: Dot Grid Cahier (Set of 2) + FREE Stickers
description:
The Dot Grid Cahier is the joint effort of Behance and New Leaf Paper, designed to bring sustainability to productivity. The Dot Grid was developed as an alternative to traditional lines and boxes. The light geometric dot matrix serves as a subtle guide for your notations and sketches, while the materials used to create each notebook are cleaned up, de-inked and bleached with hydrogen peroxide instead of chlorine.

The Dot Grid Cahier is the perfect back pocket companion, created using 100% sustainable materials. Pages made from 60lb New Leaf paper with a subtle texture (100% recycled), printed full bleed, and perforated for maximum flexibility. New Leaf Paper was founded to inspire a fundamental shift towards sustainability in the paper industry. By choosing this notebook, you are making a difference.

The Dot Grid Cahier is part of Behance's Action Method product line; designed to help push projects forward by organizing ideas, with a focus on action steps.

Usage Guidelines

1. Think beyond lines and boxes.

The dot matrix on the front and back of each page serves as a subtle guide for your notations and sketches.
Additional Information
Country of Origin: USA Size: 4 x 6" (64 pages) An accordion-style pamphlet on how to practice the Action Method accompanies every product. Item includes 2 x FREE! sheets of Action Stickers (1 blue/1 orange).

name: Behance: Action Cahier (Set of 2)
description:
Exclusive Behance UK Stockist!
The Action Cahier is the joint effort of Behance and New Leaf Paper, designed to bring sustainability to productivity. The Action Step and Notation areas on each page provide a flexible template to get the most out of meetings and everyday brainstorm sessions (see usage guidelines below), while the materials used to create each notebook are cleaned up, de-inked and bleached with hydrogen peroxide instead of chlorine. The Action Cahier is the perfect back pocket companion. Pages made from of 60lb New Leaf paper (100% recycled), printed full bleed and perforated for maximum flexibility. New Leaf Paper was founded to inspire a fundamental shift towards sustainability in the paper industry. By choosing this notebook, you are making a difference. The Action Cahier is part of Behance's Action Method product line; designed to help push projects forward by organizing ideas, with a focus on action steps.
Usage Guidelines

1. Capture Action steps, relentlessly.

During a brainstorm/meeting or on the run, ideas can come and go unless they are captured as action steps.

2. Tend to your Backburner.

Keep a "Backburner" to catch ideas that may someday become actions. Whether it is an idea for the future or some small errand you want to remember, put it in the backburner and then forget about it.

3. Think beyond lines and boxes.

The dot matrix on the front and back of each page serves as a subtle guide for your notations and sketches.
Additional Information
Country of Origin: USA Size: 3.5 x 5.5" (64 pages) An accordion-style pamphlet on how to practice the Action Method accompanies every product.

name: Sergey Safonov: Godot "Nothing To Be Done"
description:
Limited Edition of 5 units worldwide.
The name Godot is pronounced in Britain and Ireland with the emphasis on the first syllable, /ˈɠɒdoʊ/; in North America it is usually pronounced with an emphasis on the second syllable, /ɠəˈdoʊ/. The figure is named after a character of Samuel Beckett's play "Waiting for Godot", in which two characters, Vladimir and Estragon, wait for someone named Godot who never shows in and whose identity remains a mystery.
Additional Information
Country of Origin: Russia Size: Approx. 12cm / 4.5" Material: Resin Please note: This item is a handmade art toy. Slight imperfections are all part of its charm and make each piece unique - this is not a factory production piece rather a collector's edition art work.

name: Irié Wash: Parfums Mixte Eau De Toilette
description:
Exclusive UK Stockist!
The Concept
This unique collection of three different unisex Eau de Toilette Mists are designed to take you on a sensory journey through different times of the day: 09h25, 15h10 and 20h50. As indicated on the bottle. Don't feel you have to stick to the schedule though! 09h25: Starts with fresh pressed Calabrian lemon, Brazilian sweet orange, bergamot, next is green tea, Chinese mint, star anise and neroli blossoms. Finally, the depth of the fragrance is warmed up with Atlas cedar, Mysore sandalwood and Indian tea. 15h10: Refreshing Calabrian lemon, red mandarin, citrus zest, juicy guava, mellowed with citrus blossoms of flowering mandarin and lemon trees, depth is added with African citron, Virginian cedar and Australian sandalwood. 20h50: Calabrian lemon, grapefruit zest, petitgrain bigarade, Haitian lime, followed by white thyme from Provence, citrus blossoms and sambac jasmine flowers, the fragrance deepens with Javanese vetiver, cedar wood, and heliotrope flowers.
The Designer
Parisian based Japanese fashion designer, Irié is known for cutting edge designs and materials. It comes as no surprise that the Irié Wash Parfums are also very artistic in concept and delightful in scent; designed to take you on a sensory journey through different stages of the day or year.
Additional Information
Country of Origin: France Size: 3 x 25ml EDT Spray
Product excluded from international delivery
Delivery for mainland UK only. This item is prohibited from air transit as highly flammable and is therefore excluded from all international delivery - sorry!

name: Irié Wash: Fluo Room Mist
description:
Exclusive UK Stockist!
The Concept
This unique collection of designer room mists are the perfect antidote to creative block - or stuffy studio air! Light, energising and refreshing. Creativity and zen will be restored to the work place. Really. Those cynics amongst you, or blokey blokes, the packaging alone is inspiration. Definitely a studio "must-have" - on many levels. Jaune Fluo: Bitter Lemon Room Mist by Irié. Fluorescent yellow to add a zest of lemon to your studio. Vert Fluo: Basil & Mint Room Mist by Irié. Fluorescent green for minty freshness. Orange Fluo: Orange Flower Room Mist by Irié. Fluorescent orange for a smell of blossoming orange trees.
The Designer
Parisian based Japanese fashion designer, Irié is known for cutting edge designs and materials. It comes as no surprise that the Irié Wash Parfums are also very artistic in concept and delightful in scent; designed to take you on a sensory journey through different stages of the day or year.
Additional Information
Country of Origin: France Size: 150ml
Product excluded from international delivery
Delivery for mainland UK only. This item is prohibited from air transit as highly flammable and is therefore excluded from all international delivery - sorry!

name: Irié Wash: Bonne Année Room Mist Collection
description:
Exclusive UK Stockist!
Limited Edition of 600 units worldwide.
All boxes are numbered. We have managed to get our sticky little fingers on but a few of them, so contemplate for too long and they may be gone!
The Concept
Each of the six room fragrance mists in this eclectic collection are designed to take you on a sensory journey through different stages of the year. January/February: Spiced Mimosa March/April: Sweet Mint May/June: Green Lemon July/August: White Gardenia September/October: Cedar & Vetiver November/December: Warmed Wood
The Designer
Parisian based Japanese fashion designer, Irié is known for cutting edge designs and materials. It comes as no surprise that the Irié Wash Parfums are also very artistic in concept and delightful in scent; designed to take you on a sensory journey through different stages of the day or year.

name: Undergrowth Design: Blaue Blume Ceramic Teacup Set
description:
Handmade in London, the Blaue Blume teacup is the first item produced for the "Blaue Blume" range. An original piece, which heralded the start of Blaue Blume product line following its popularity with the press when it first launched in 2007. A dainty size, white ceramic teacup with sexy Monroe legs, 9k gold shoes, antique lace textures and matching saucer. Add a sense of fun to a traditional British afternoon tea with some quintessential quirk! Also makes for a very cute cup to serve desserts like jelly in! Manufactured in the UK by highly skilled ceramists, the unusual design is made by casting lace directly onto the ceramic.
The Designer
Tina Tsang graduated from Central Saint Martins in 2005 in illustration and animation. Her diverse background that includes film, painting, animation,photography, costume design, fashion design and trend forecasting has enabled her to have a broad understanding of aesthetics and trends within the design world. She uses an interdisciplinary approach to designing and feels that her experience in many design disciplines helps enrich the quality and depth of her work. She enjoys making products that interact with the user on an emotional level making objects of desire of an heirloom quality that we can keep and treasure
Additional Information
Country of Origin: United Kingdom Size: Cup 5cm high x 9cm ø / Saucer 14cm ø Set Includes: 1 Teacup + Saucer Other: 9k Gold

name: MTN x DONDI Limited Edition Can (Yellow Spray Paint)
description:
Limited Edition of 500 units worldwide.
The Concept
BODEGA x MONTANA COLORS presents a special commemorative can celebrating the life of the legendary Dondi White. This limited edition can benefits The Dondi White Foundation, which raises funds for AIDS charities through various activities and events in the arts community. Contributions made in the memory of Dondi White will be used to support educational programs on HIV/AIDS prevention and services aimed at improving the lives of those affected by AIDS. Strictly for collectors. This edition is being flipped for $75 on eBay!
The Artist
Graffiti writer, Dondi White, came up in the 1970s plastering his name and many aliases on dozens of subway trains. Originally a member of TOP he then created his own crew, CIA. For the next 20 odd years, Dondi became recognised as the stylistic standard, influencing a generation of graffiti writers. His most famous work was Children of the Grave Parts 1, 2 and 3 - three whole cars in the New York subway. Many European graffiti writers credit White’s work in a hip-hop music video called “Buffalo Gals” as their first exposure to graffiti. Dondi died of AIDS on October 2nd, 1998.
Additional Information
Country of Origin: Spain Paint Colour: Yellow Size: 400ml Other: Caps sold separately
Important! Please Read...
You must be over 18 years of age to purchase this product. Please read our Terms for more information. This item is prohibited from air transit and can only be shipped within Mainland UK.

name: MTN x DARE Limited Edition Can (Black Spray Paint)
description:
Limited Edition of 500 units worldwide.
The Concept
MTN limited edition can, designed by DARE and produced by MONTANA COLORS, as usual, in a really limited amount. Strictly for collectors.
The Artist
Dare, with his influence on Wild Style, is a total and constant reference for European Writing since he started in the 80's. A member of the famous TWS, he's well-known as one of the best exponents of Swiss School of Graffiti. His works can be interpreted as written self portraits; every letter is unique and has its own expression reflecting the artist's daily feelings and representing his name. Dare induces his own writing style, punctuated by elegant and fluid poses, always exploring new posibilities and techniques on his canvases. Qualified as "branding", his style has an unique identity, including letters outlined with extreme precision, layers of bright colours and original backgrounds.
Additional Information
Country of Origin: Spain Paint Colour: Black Size: 400ml Other: Caps sold separately
Important! Please Read...
You must be over 18 years of age to purchase this product. Please read our Terms for more information. This item is prohibited from air transit and can only be shipped within Mainland UK.

name: MTN x SABER Limited Edition Can (Cosmos Violet Spray Paint)
description:
Limited Edition of 500 units worldwide.
The Concept
MTN limited edition can, designed by SABER and produced by MONTANA COLORS, as usual, in a really limited amount. Strictly for collectors.
The Artist
Saber, member of the legendary 7th Letter Crew (LA) is a master of style. Made in California and exported worldwide. Already a fixture in the Los Angeles graffiti scene, but in 1997 when he completed the largest graffiti piece ever created he was catapulted to global legend. His piece on the sloping cement bank of the Los Angeles River is nearly the size of a professional football field and can be read clear as day from a satellite photo. His work is also documented by his masterpiece book, Mad Society.
Additional Information
Country of Origin: Spain Paint Colour: Cosmos Violet Size: 400ml Other: Caps sold separately
Important! Please Read...
You must be over 18 years of age to purchase this product. Please read our Terms for more information. This item is prohibited from air transit and can only be shipped within Mainland UK.

name: MTN x SEEN Limited Edition Can (Cascade Green Spray Paint)
description:
Limited Edition of 500 units worldwide.
The Concept
MTN limited edition can, designed by SEEN and produced by MONTANA COLORS, as usual, in a really limited amount. Strictly for collectors.
The Artist
Seen is one of the most famous American graffiti artists, often referred to as The Godfather of Graffiti. His crew, United Artists, quickly gained the reputation for producing full colour whole cars and he was responsible for dozens of whole car top to bottoms - many of which have become iconic images of the time. During the early 80's, Seen started producing work on canvas, shown by galleries and bought by museums and private collectors across the globe. Despite the high demand for his work in Europe and constant world travel, Seen continued to hit the New York subway trains right up until 1989, long after many had admitted defeat to the MTA. He was also featured prominently in the PBS 1983 documentary Style Wars. In the late 80's, Seen turned his talent to tattoo art and opening TATTOO SEEN, which quickly became one of the most successful studios in New York. He continues to exhibit worldwide and produce work with, and alongside, artists such as Banksy.
Additional Information
Country of Origin: Spain Paint Colour: Cascade Green Size: 400ml Other: Caps sold separately
Important! Please Read...
You must be over 18 years of age to purchase this product. Please read our Terms for more information. This item is prohibited from air transit and can only be shipped within Mainland UK.

description:
This can is full of special solvent that will dissolve the paint and unblock your freshly blocked caps. It can also create special effects when used as a spray!

name: Montana Cap Combo Pack (15)
description:
A selection (15 caps) of some of the most popular caps used in graffiti. Each pack includes at least one of the following: Yellow with Black Dot Universal Cap, NY Skinny Cap, NY Fat Cap, Rusto Fat Cap, Grey Dot Cap, Black Dot Cap, Pink Dot Fat Cap, Orange Dot Fat Cap, Skinny Pro #1 Cap, Silver Super Fat Cap, Astro Fat Cap, Transversal Cap #1, Needle Cap.
Individual Cap Info
Yellow with Black Dot Universal Cap: Perfect for outlining. NY Skinny Cap: Produces a medium-thin, semi-soft, medium-weight. New York: (Known by many names!) Outlines, phantom tips, thins, micros, and skinnies. NY Fat Cap: Produces a medium-wide, medium-weight, semi-soft line much like the NY Skinny but slightly broader - they look a lot like the NY Skinny too. To tell them apart, note the ridges - the Fats have wider ridges than the Skinnies and the centre of the dot is larger. Rusto Fat Cap: Slightly wider than the NY Fat Cap. Grey Dot Cap: The first in the series of colored-dot caps which range from ultra-thin to ultra-wide; one of the skinniest caps available. Produces a thin, soft and light line, perhaps making it better suited for drippy brands - good for accents. Black Dot Cap: The same as Grey Dots, but just a little bit wider. Pink Dot Fat Cap: The fattest cap available! Create lines 15-20 cm in diameter - good for filling in large areas (or making giant paintings). Orange Dot Fat Cap: Wider than NY and Rusto Fats and about the same as Silver Super Fats. Compared with Silver Super Fats, the line is a little softer and lighter. Skinny Pro #1 Cap: Produces a thin to medium line - used for outlining and detailed work. Silver Super Fat Cap: This is one of the most versatile caps out there; it produces a wide line, wider than any of the caps mentioned above, with a sharp edge. Astro Fat Cap: This super fat high pressure cap is great for filling in a large area quickly. Transversal Cap #1: Produces a very soft, thin line; these caps have a special insert that creates a "linear" spray instead of the circular spray that the other caps have so the spray will be wide in one direction, narrow in the other - great for signing your name or just creating special effects. Needle Cap: Produces an ultra-ultra-thin line, not even a centimetre in width, but very heavy - however, it leaves some splatter marks - love 'em or hate 'em! Perfect for detailing with pencil-like lines.
Additional Information
Country of Origin: Spain Size: Various

name: Jon Lawrence: Ceramic Nike "Dunks"
description:
Limited Edition of 100 units worldwide.
No design studio is complete without this limited edition pair of lilac glazed porcelain Nike “Dunks” with changeable black laces. Confuse and confound people, we dare you! This is a rare opportunity to get your paws (or should that be pads!) on a very collectible piece of modern art from one of Britain's emerging talents; ceramic sculptor, Jon Lawrence. How you display them is entirely up to you but we're not overly convinced by the Sales Manager's suggestion of growing cress in them... but, as the old adage goes - art is in the eye of the beholder!!! Needless to say, we're giving them pride of place in the studio (next to a rather subtle “TRY ON AT YOUR PERIL!” sign).
The Artist
Having exhibited in numerous highly acclaimed galleries such as the Crafts Council “New Faces” Showcase, in London’s prestigious V&A, and winning both Artsmix and Prince’s Trust grants serve testament to Jon Lawrence’s work. Concerned by the loss of humanity and childhood memories within society, he endeavours to preserve elements as 3D objects; robust, tactile and purposefully imperfect, he strives to challenge traditional ideas, habits and assumptions. Using traditional techniques of slip casting and silversmithing, Jon is able to express objects with integrity and character. Found at auctions, charity shops or from his own collection, he casts these objects making clay replicas, manipulating and fusing them together adding transfers, lustres and graffiti like scrawls.
Additional Information
Country of Origin: UK Size: Mens UK 8 / 42 EU (we're guessing!)

name: Jon Lawrence: Ceramic Adidas "Hi Tops"
description:
Limited Edition of 100 units worldwide.
No design studio is complete without this limited edition pair of lilac glazed porcelain Nike “Dunks” with changeable neon orange laces. Confuse and confound people, we dare you! This is a rare opportunity to get your paws (or should that be pads!) on a very collectible piece of modern art from one of Britain's emerging talents; ceramic sculptor, Jon Lawrence. How you display them is entirely up to you but we're not overly convinced by the Sales Manager's suggestion of growing cress in them... but, as the old adage goes - art is in the eye of the beholder!!! Needless to say, we're giving them pride of place in the studio (next to a rather subtle “TRY ON AT YOUR PERIL!” sign).
The Artist
Having exhibited in numerous highly acclaimed galleries such as the Crafts Council “New Faces” Showcase, in London’s prestigious V&A, and winning both Artsmix and Prince’s Trust grants serve testament to Jon Lawrence’s work. Concerned by the loss of humanity and childhood memories within society, he endeavours to preserve elements as 3D objects; robust, tactile and purposefully imperfect, he strives to challenge traditional ideas, habits and assumptions. Using traditional techniques of slip casting and silversmithing, Jon is able to express objects with integrity and character. Found at auctions, charity shops or from his own collection, he casts these objects making clay replicas, manipulating and fusing them together adding transfers, lustres and graffiti like scrawls.

name: Behance: Action Pad Mini
description:
Exclusive Behance UK Stockist!
The Action Pad Mini is part of Behance's Action Method product line, to help creative professionals boost productivity and make ideas happen. Designed to help us push projects forward by organising our ideas and focusing on action steps. Each page includes an action step zone, a backburner area and a clean dot grid (on the back of each page) for your notes. The template was designed to get the most out of meetings and everyday brainstorm sessions. Especially helpful as a companion to Moleskine notebooks. Some creative professionals use Moleskine or similar books for all notations and sketches, and use sheets from the Action Pad Mini to record and track action steps. One product tester in the movie business attaches a sheet from the Action Pad Mini to the front of each project folder. We encourage you to develop your own system based on the Action Method. While the Action Pad Mini has many users across the creative realms, it's a favorite among casting agencies and creative professionals that travel often. Made from 80lb Premium Blend paper with a subtle texture (30% post-consumer recycled), printed full bleed and padded.
Usage Guidelines

1. Capture Action steps, relentlessly.

During a brainstorm/meeting or on the run, ideas can come and go unless they are captured as action steps.

2. Tend to your Backburner.

Keep a "Backburner" to catch ideas that may someday become actions. Whether it is an idea for the future or some small errand you want to remember, put it in the backburner and then forget about it.

3. Think beyond lines and boxes.

The dot grid on the front and back of each page serves as a subtle guide for your notations and sketches.
Additional Information
Country of Origin: USA Size: 5 x 7" (40 pages) An accordion-style pamphlet on how to practice the Action Method accompanies every product.

name: Behance: Action Pad
description:

Designed to help us push projects forward by organising our ideas and focusing on action steps. Features four distinct zones on each page to provide a flexible template to get the most out of meetings and everyday brainstorm sessions (see usage guidelines below). Made from 80lb Premium Blend paper with a subtle texture (30% post-consumer recycled), printed full bleed, padded, and perforated along with a three-hole punch.

2. Tend to your Backburner.

Keep a "Backburner" to catch ideas that may someday become actions. Whether it is an idea for the future or some small errand you want to remember, put it in the backburner and then forget about it.

name: Behance: Action Runner
description:
Exclusive Behance UK Stockist!
The Action Runner is part of Behance's Action Method product line, to help creative professionals boost productivity and make ideas happen. Designed to help us push projects forward by organising our ideas and focusing on action steps. The front of each page provides a handy template to capture ideas as action steps when you're on the run. The back of each page features a dot grid for notations and sketches (see usage guidelines below). Developed by demand! Developed in response to 100's of suggestions Behance received from users of the Action Method who wanted "a mini action book like product for action management on-the-run" or a "Behance Action Book meets Hipster PDA." Well, here it is. Loyal users of the Action Runner include artists, design studios, freelance fashion designers, advertising executives, and entrepreneurs. Features a unique suede-to-the-touch hard cover, created using 100% sustainable materials. Pages made from 80lb Premium Blend paper with a subtle texture (30% post-consumer recycled), printed full bleed and perforated for maximum flexibility.
Usage Guidelines

1. Capture Action steps, relentlessly.

During a brainstorm/meeting or on the run, ideas can come and go unless they are captured as action steps.

2. Tend to your Backburner.

Keep a "Backburner" to catch ideas that may someday become actions. Whether it is an idea for the future or some small errand you want to remember, put it in the backburner and then forget about it.
Additional Information
Country of Origin: USA Size: 3.5 x 5.5" (50 pages) An accordion-style pamphlet on how to practice the Action Method accompanies every product.

name: Behance: Action Book
description:
Exclusive Behance UK Stockist!
The Action Book is part of Behance's Action Method product line, to help creative professionals boost productivity and make ideas happen. Designed to help us push projects forward by organising our ideas and focusing on action steps. Features four distinct zones on each page to provide a flexible template to get the most out of meetings and everyday brainstorm sessions (see usage guidelines below). Used by leading creatives in the agency/advertising world as well as at top design studios and innovative companies like us! Your Passion is your work, treat it well. Features a unique suede-to-the-touch hard cover, created using 100% sustainable materials. Pages made from 80lb Premium Blend paper with a subtle texture (30% post-consumer recycled), printed full bleed, double perforated and 3-hole punched between both perforations for maximum flexibility.
Usage Guidelines

1. Capture Action steps, relentlessly.

During a brainstorm/meeting or on the run, ideas can come and go unless they are captured as action steps.

2. Tend to your Backburner.

Keep a "Backburner" to catch ideas that may someday become actions. Whether it is an idea for the future or some small errand you want to remember, put it in the backburner and then forget about it.

3. Think beyond lines and boxes.

The dot matrix on the front and back of each page serves as a subtle guide for your notations and sketches.

4. Preparation and Focus Items.

Plan for meetings beforehand and be sure to address your focus items.
Other Information
Country of Origin: USA Size: 8.5 x 10.5" (50 pages) An accordion-style pamphlet on how to practice the Action Method accompanies every product.

name: Behance: Dot Grid Book
description:
Exclusive UK / Europe Stockist!
The Dot Grid Book was designed by the Behance team in response to requests from graphic designers testing the Action Method. The dot grid was developed as an alternative to traditional lines and boxes. The light geometric dot matrix serves as a subtle guide for your notations and sketches (see usage guidelines below) - and magically fades when scanned! Used by leading creatives in the agency/advertising world as well as at top design studios and innovative companies like us! Your Passion is your work, treat it well. Features a unique suede-to-the-touch hard cover, created using 100% sustainable materials. Pages made from 80lb Premium Blend paper with a subtle texture (30% post-consumer recycled), printed full bleed, double perforated and 3-hole punched between both perforations for maximum flexibility.
Usage Guidelines

1. Think beyond lines and boxes.

The dot matrix on the front and back of each page serves as a subtle guide for your notations and sketches.
Additional Information
Country of Origin: USA Size: 9 x 10.5" (50 pages) An accordion-style pamphlet on how to practice the Action Method accompanies every product.

name: Behance: Action Stickers
description:
Exclusive Behance UK Stockist!
Action Stickers were designed by the Behance team in response to requests from testers of the Action Method. Each removable sticky-back action step can be peeled from the card and placed on magazine covers, drafts of projects, or in traditional notebooks. Action Stickers help bring your action steps to the surface, ultimately catching your attention. The stickers are part of Behance's Action Method product line, the first in a series of Behance projects to help creative professionals boost productivity and make ideas happen. Designed to help us push projects forward by organizing our ideas and focusing on action steps. Made from 60lb Premium Removable Adhesive, full bleed.
Usage Guidelines

1. Capture Action steps, relentlessly.

During a brainstorm/meeting or on the run, ideas can come and go unless they are captured as action steps.

2. Tend to your Backburner.

Keep a "Backburner" to catch ideas that may someday become actions. Whether it is an idea for the future or some small errand you want to remember, put it in the backburner and then forget about it.
Additional Information
Country of Origin: USA Size: 3 x 5" (15 sheets) An accordion-style pamphlet on how to practice the Action Method accompanies every product.

name: Vannen Watches x Christopher Bettig "Winter Exclusive"
description:
Limited Edition of 100 units worldwide.
The Concept
Collector's edition, blind packed in a limited edition Snow Pack. You may even be lucky enough to receive a super rare Silver Snowflake Chase version.
Chase Variant
This watch is blind packed meaning you may be lucky enough to receive the much coveted Silver Snowflake Chase - super rare, only 10 chases worldwide. Strictly a surprise colour variant to the “Winter Exclusive”. If you end up with the silver snowflake watch, we guess that means you've got Lady Luck on side!
The Concept
The heart of Vannen Watches is to expose extraordinary artwork to people that may never have the opportunity to discover it, much less incorporate it into their lives. Each collection of watches is produced with one goal in mind – to support the global art scene by bringing awareness to each artist and invite the world to experience something new. Going beyond the realms of current art merchandising - Vannen Limited Edition Artist Watches not only tell time, they tell a story. A new movement in art is about to happen. That movement is Vannen. Individually inspected, assembled and packaged by hand in the USA - every Vannen Watch is treated like a true piece of art. Click here for more info.
The Artist
Chris' work is a sea of pattern, repetition, geometry and natural forms used to make abstract landscapes. His work varies in mediums, but share a universal theme of recycling and reusing common objects. Chris is a French / American artist currently based in LA, who graduated from the Maryland Institute College of art with a degree in painting. His work has been featured in solo exhibits in LA, NYC & SF as well as in group shows in Japan, Australia, N. America and Europe. Several international publications have also featured his work such as Lucky Magazine & The New York Times. In 2004 Chris founded The Mountain Label, where he handles a wide range of design projects for: Analogue Books, Arden B., Carhartt-Europe & Japan, 2K, Circa, Converse, Fila, Nike, Nili Lotan, Poketo, Puma, Urban Outfitters, Threadless, Vannen and many more.
Watch Spec
Wrist: Medium Size - 7.75" Movement: 3-Hand Japanese Quartz Dial: 28mm, Screen printed, Multicolor Case: 34mm, Plastic, Glossy White Crystal: Plastic with Protective Film Buckle: Plastic, Glossy White Loop: Plastic, Glossy White Straps: 16mm Wide, Sandwich Strap
Features
Clear polybag packaging filled with non-toxic fake snow and snowflakes. Also comes with a 2-color silkscreen print signed and numbered by Chris.
Additional Information
Country of Origin: USA Water resistant up to 10m / 30' but not recommended. Please keep your watch out of hot tubs and saunas!

name: Seletti: Bike Si-Lock
description:
One for all of you fixie fanatics!!! Design centric bike lock; powerful chain encased in colourful plain leather and neat padlock - you may have to watch that the lock doesn't receive unwanted interest of its own though! Side note: When Julia, our lovely photographer, was in the studio shooting these for us, she had a visit from her 'bike obsessed' brother-in-law who thought these were neat as most chains weren't protected and caused damage to the bike itself! Just sayin'... form AND functional, aces. Suitable for bicycles and scooters.
Additional Information
Size: 88cm Includes: Chain, Padlock + 2 Keys

name: Pull-in Underwear: Cotton Shorty - Apple 14 (Cotton) MEN
description:
Street style underwear. Bad ass - literally. Hip underthings that are as comfortable and practical as they are stylish whether you're riding, skating or just doing what you do.
The Brand
Pull-in Underwear - undergarments for riders - for men, women and kids with a ‘high-tech’ and trendy influence. An awesome brand created in Hossegor, South West France, which has their own team of surfers, skaters and snowboarders to show off their pants. They won't actually make your riding any better, but they sure are rather nice. Enjoy the ride!
Additional Information
Country of Origin: France Colour: Apple Green with White Trim / White Waistband Material: 95% Cotton / 5% Elastin
